page.title: 14A DAY AT MIDDLE SCHOOL
page.content: It's 7.00a.m._my little brother Sam is standing on my head hitting me, pulling and shaking me_a very hepful alarm! I go down to find he's messed the whole room up! Iwatch the news and sport whilst Mum gets breakfast. News is normally about Lebanon, bombers or hijackers. At 8.35 I leave for school to play football till the whistle to get into line. In school hang my coat and go into class. Today we are doing the{Domesday Project!}We get what we need, line up to do the amenities count in Bewbush and Gossops Green. Then it's lunch and playtime, followed by lessons, play (2.10) and finally storytime at 3.00 from my teacher. At 3.30 we stack chairs, collect bags, walk home over the main road, then run to my house, change, have a drink, and play around "death tree". Tea is at 6, homework then play or bath and to bed.
